body:
Comment 13: 
I am glad you found your problem.

> Now the latest output is as follows(only one fail remains),
> --- FAIL: TestIdentityResponse (0.01 seconds)
>         serve_test.go:453: error with Get of http://127.0.0.1:1431/?overwrite=1 Get
http://127.0.0.1:1431/?overwrite=1 EOF

I suspect this would be "firewall" or "virus check" related. Do you have any such
monitoring software installed?

Alex
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
